item.title: LeetCode Guide
item.description: Let’s address the elephant in the room: LeetCode isn’t about becoming a better programmer.

item.title: Blockchain: Beyond the Hype
item.description: Blockchain has been called everything from “the most important invention since the internet” to “a solution looking for a problem.

item.title: Inside AWS: Lessons from My Internship
item.description: Three months at Amazon Web Services taught me more about real software engineering than two years of coursework.

item.title: Cloud Computing Fundamentals
item.description: An in-depth exploration of cloud computing fundamentals, covering everything from basic concepts to advanced deployment strategies and containerization technologies.

item.title: RESTful APIs
item.description: Let’s talk about building RESTful APIs that don’t fall apart in production.

item.title: Git Fundamentals
item.description: Let’s be honest about Git: everyone pretends to understand it, but most of us are secretly terrified we’ll accidentally delete the entire codebase with one wrong command.

item.title: Atelier
item.description: A project management platform designed to streamline how development teams work together by bringing task tracking, team communication, and project analytics into one unified workspace.

item.title: Thoughts on Devin: AI Software Engineer
item.description: When Cognition Labs announced Devin as the “world’s first AI software engineer,” the tech community’s reaction ranged from excitement to existential dread.

item.title: PacmanAI
item.description: A comprehensive suite of AI agents for the Pac-Man game, implementing fundamental artificial intelligence techniques from graph search to reinforcement learning.

item.title: Gitlet
item.description: A lightweight version control system that implements Git’s core functionality from scratch in Java.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a software engineer passionate about building scalable systems and solving complex problems.
